display_html:
newtype PolicyID era = PolicyID {
  • policyID ∷ ScriptHash era
}
name: PolicyID PolicyID policyID

display_html: type family MAValue (x ∷ MaryOrAllegra) era ∷ Type where ...
name: MAValue

display_html:
data Timelock era where
  • pattern Interval ∷ Era era ⇒ ValidityInterval → Timelock era
  • pattern Multi ∷ Era era ⇒ MultiSig era → Timelock era
  • pattern TimelockAnd ∷ Era era ⇒ StrictSeq (Timelock era) → Timelock era
  • pattern TimelockOr ∷ Era era ⇒ StrictSeq (Timelock era) → Timelock era
name: Timelock Interval Multi TimelockAnd TimelockOr

display_html: validateTimelock ∷ (TxBodyConstraints era, HasField "vldt" (TxBody era) ValidityInterval) ⇒ Timelock era → Tx era → Bool
name: validateTimelock

display_html:
newtype TxBody e where
  • STxBody (MemoBytes (TxBody' e))
  • pattern TxBody ∷ FamsTo era ⇒ Set (TxIn era) → StrictSeq (TxOut era) → StrictSeq (DCert era) → Wdrl era → Coin → ValidityInterval → StrictMaybe (Update era) → StrictMaybe (MetaDataHash era) → Value era → TxBody era
name: TxBody TxBody STxBody

display_html:
data TxBody' era = TxBody' {
  • inputs ∷ !(Set (TxIn era))
  • outputs ∷ !(StrictSeq (TxOut era))
  • certs ∷ !(StrictSeq (DCert era))
  • wdrls ∷ !(Wdrl era)
  • txfee ∷ !Coin
  • vldt ∷ !ValidityInterval
  • txupdate ∷ !(StrictMaybe (Update era))
  • mdhash ∷ !(StrictMaybe (MetaDataHash era))
  • forge ∷ !(Value era)
}
name: TxBody' TxBody' certs inputs outputs txfee wdrls vldt txupdate mdhash forge

display_html:
data UtxoPredicateFailure era
  • = BadInputsUTxO !(Set (TxIn era))
  • | OutsideValidityIntervalUTxO !ValidityInterval !SlotNo
  • | MaxTxSizeUTxO !Integer !Integer
  • | InputSetEmptyUTxO
  • | FeeTooSmallUTxO !Coin !Coin
  • | ValueNotConservedUTxO !(Value era) !(Value era)
  • | WrongNetwork !Network !(Set (Addr era))
  • | WrongNetworkWithdrawal !Network !(Set (RewardAcnt era))
  • | OutputTooSmallUTxO ![TxOut era]
  • | UpdateFailure (PredicateFailure (PPUP era))
  • | OutputBootAddrAttrsTooBig ![TxOut era]
  • | TriesToForgeADA
name: UtxoPredicateFailure TriesToForgeADA OutsideValidityIntervalUTxO OutputBootAddrAttrsTooBig UpdateFailure OutputTooSmallUTxO WrongNetworkWithdrawal WrongNetwork ValueNotConservedUTxO FeeTooSmallUTxO InputSetEmptyUTxO MaxTxSizeUTxO BadInputsUTxO

display_html: consumed ∷ ∀ era. (ShelleyBased era, HasField "certs" (TxBody era) (StrictSeq (DCert era)), HasField "inputs" (TxBody era) (Set (TxIn era)), HasField "forge" (TxBody era) (Value era), HasField "wdrls" (TxBody era) (Wdrl era)) ⇒ PParams era → UTxO era → TxBody era → Value era
name: consumed

display_html: utxoTransition ∷ ∀ era. (ShelleyBased era, STS (UTXO era), Embed (PPUP era) (UTXO era), BaseM (UTXO era) ~ ShelleyBase, Environment (UTXO era) ~ UtxoEnv era, State (UTXO era) ~ UTxOState era, Signal (UTXO era) ~ Tx era, PredicateFailure (UTXO era) ~ UtxoPredicateFailure era, HasField "certs" (TxBody era) (StrictSeq (DCert era)), HasField "inputs" (TxBody era) (Set (TxIn era)), HasField "forge" (TxBody era) (Value era), HasField "outputs" (TxBody era) (StrictSeq (TxOut era)), HasField "wdrls" (TxBody era) (Wdrl era), HasField "txfee" (TxBody era) Coin, HasField "vldt" (TxBody era) ValidityInterval, HasField "update" (TxBody era) (StrictMaybe (Update era))) ⇒ TransitionRule (UTXO era)
name: utxoTransition

display_html:
class GetPolicies a era where
  • getPolicies ∷ a → Set (PolicyID era)
name: GetPolicies getPolicies

display_html: scriptsNeeded ∷ (ShelleyBased era, GetPolicies (Value era) era, HasField "certs" (TxBody era) (StrictSeq (DCert era)), HasField "wdrls" (TxBody era) (Wdrl era), HasField "inputs" (TxBody era) (Set (TxIn era)), HasField "forge" (TxBody era) (Value era)) ⇒ UTxO era → Tx era → Set (ScriptHash era)
name: scriptsNeeded
